Card.cardDescription:
Effect: Once during your main phase, you may attach 1 card from your hand face down onto this card; if you do so, you may move WOODEN OX TRANSPORT along with the cards attached onto it, to another hero's empty equipment zone.
You may play or discard any of the face down cards attached to this equipment as if it was from your hand.(They do not count towards your hand size limit, but count as being played/discarded from you hand when you do so.)
Only the owner of this equipment may look at the face down cards attached to this equipment.
